title: Chris Herring on the ’90s Knicks, the Current Knicks, and the Chicago Bulls | Real Ones
description:
Sports Illustrated’s Chris Herring joins Logan and Raja to talk about the ’90s Knicks teams in his new book ‘Blood in the Garden: The Flagrant History of the 1990s New York Knicks’ (0:30), his thoughts on the present-day Knicks team (24:50), and how the Chicago Bulls are making this season count (33:40).
Hosts: Logan Murdock and Raja Bell
Guest: Chris Herring
Associate Producer: Sasha Ashall
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
